channel.title: I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi
channel.description: Recent content in I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi

item.title: About Me
item.description: A research scientist and software engineer working on self-driving cars and connected vehicles. I love everything about computer science and math. My educational background and expertise are in Artificial Intelligence, vehicle communications, and machine learning. Currently, I am part of the connected and automated vehicle group at Honda R&D Americas. My role includes research and development of perception-based applications for Autonomous Driving and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems in the context of intelligent transportation systems.

item.title: Publications

Composite alpha-mu Based DSRC Channel Model Using Large Data Set of RSSI Measurements Mahjoub, H. N.; Tahmasbi-Sarvestani, A.; Gani, SM.O.; Fallah, Y. P.; 2018 IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems. A Learning-based Stochastic MPC Design for Cooperative Adaptive Cruise Control to Handle Interfering Vehicles Kazemi, H.
